commit.message:
verify.cc (_Jv_BytecodeVerifier::branch_prepass): Skip a short, not a byte.

	* verify.cc (_Jv_BytecodeVerifier::branch_prepass) [op_sipush]:
	Skip a short, not a byte.
	[op_newarray]: Skip a byte, not a short.

From-SVN: r47163

files.patch:
@@ -1,5 +1,9 @@
 2001-11-18  Tom Tromey  <tromey@redhat.com>
 
+	* verify.cc (_Jv_BytecodeVerifier::branch_prepass) [op_sipush]:
+	Skip a short, not a byte.
+	[op_newarray]: Skip a byte, not a short.
+
 	* verify.cc (_Jv_BytecodeVerifier::get_type_val_for_signature):
 	Added `B' case.

@@ -1347,7 +1347,6 @@ class _Jv_BytecodeVerifier
 	    break;
 
 	  case op_bipush:
-	  case op_sipush:
 	  case op_ldc:
 	  case op_iload:
 	  case op_lload:
@@ -1361,17 +1360,18 @@ class _Jv_BytecodeVerifier
 	  case op_astore:
 	  case op_arraylength:
 	  case op_ret:
+	  case op_newarray:
 	    get_byte ();
 	    break;
 
+	  case op_sipush:
 	  case op_ldc_w:
 	  case op_ldc2_w:
 	  case op_getstatic:
 	  case op_getfield:
 	  case op_putfield:
 	  case op_putstatic:
 	  case op_new:
-	  case op_newarray:
 	  case op_anewarray:
 	  case op_instanceof:
 	  case op_checkcast:
